constraint.name: SystemContextNameNotNullAuditRule
constraint.message: SystemContext name must not be null

constraint.name: EntityContextIdNotNullAuditRule
constraint.message: EntityContext ID must not be null

constraint.name: EntityContextEntityNotNullAuditRule
constraint.message: EntityContext entity must not be null

constraints.constraint: system.entities->forAll(e | ((e<>self) implies (e.id<>self.id)) and e.situations->forAll(s | s.id<>self.id) and e.situations->forAll(s | s.sensingConditions->forAll(sc| sc.id<>self.id) and s.memoryConditions->forAll(mc|mc.id<>self.id) and s.actions->forAll(a|a.id<>self.id) ) and e.variables->forAll(v | v.id<>self.id) and e.state->forAll(st | st.id<>self.id) ) EntityContextIdUniqueAuditRule EntityContext ID must be unique
system.entities->forAll(e| (e<>self) implies (e.entity<>self.entity)) EntityContextNameUniqueAuditRule EntityContext name must be unique

constraint.name: VariableDataDefinitionNameNotNullAuditRule
constraint.message: VariableDataDefinition name must not be null

constraint.name: VariableDataDefinitionDefinitionNotNullAuditRule
constraint.message: VariableDataDefinition definition must not be null

constraint.name: VariableDataDefinitionIdNotNullAuditRule
constraint.message: VariableDataDefinition ID must not be null

constraints.constraint: entityContext.variables->forAll(v| (v<>self) implies(v.name<>self.name)) VariableDataDefinitionNameUniqueAuditRule VariableDataDefinition name must be unique in the entity context

entityContext.system.entities->forAll(e | (e.id<>self.id) and e.situations->forAll(s | s.id<>self.id) and e.situations->forAll(s | s.sensingConditions->forAll(sc| sc.id<>self.id) and s.memoryConditions->forAll(mc|mc.id<>self.id) and s.actions->forAll(a|a.id<>self.id) ) and e.variables->forAll(v | (v<>self) implies (v.id<>self.id)) and e.state->forAll(st | st.id<>self.id) )
VariableDataDefinitionIdUniqueAuditRule VariableDataDefinition ID must be unique

constraint.name: ContextConditionIdNotNullAuditRule
constraint.message: ContextCondition ID must not be null

constraint.name: SensingContextConditionInformationFlowNotNullAuditRule
constraint.message: SensingContextCondition InformationFlow must not be null

constraints.constraint:
situation.entityContext.system.entities->forAll(e | (e.id<>self.id) and e.situations->forAll(s | s.id<>self.id) and e.situations->forAll(s | s.sensingConditions->forAll(sc| (sc<>self) implies (sc.id<>self.id)) and s.memoryConditions->forAll(mc|mc.id<>self.id) and s.actions->forAll(a|a.id<>self.id) ) and e.variables->forAll(v | (v.id<>self.id)) and e.state->forAll(st | st.id<>self.id) )
SensingContextConditionIdUniqueAuditRule SensingContextCondition ID must be unique

constraint.name: MemoryContextConditionExpressionNotNullAuditRule
constraint.message: MemoryContextCondition expression must not be null

constraints.constraint:
situation.entityContext.system.entities->forAll(e | (e.id<>self.id) and e.situations->forAll(s | s.id<>self.id) and e.situations->forAll(s | s.sensingConditions->forAll(sc| (sc.id<>self.id)) and s.memoryConditions->forAll(mc| (mc<>self) implies (mc.id<>self.id)) and s.actions->forAll(a|a.id<>self.id) ) and e.variables->forAll(v | (v.id<>self.id)) and e.state->forAll(st | st.id<>self.id) )
MemoryConditionIdUniqueAuditRule MemoryCondition ID must be unique

entityContext.system.entities->forAll(e | (e.id<>self.id) and e.situations->forAll(s | (s<>self) implies (s.id<>self.id)) and e.situations->forAll(s | s.sensingConditions->forAll(sc| (sc.id<>self.id)) and s.memoryConditions->forAll(mc| (mc.id<>self.id)) and s.actions->forAll(a|a.id<>self.id) ) and e.variables->forAll(v | (v.id<>self.id)) and e.state->forAll(st | st.id<>self.id) )
ContextSituationIdUniqueAuditRule ContextSituation ID must be unique

constraint.name: ContextSituationNameNotNullAuditRule
constraint.message: ContextSituation name must not be null

constraint.name: ContextSituationIdNotNullAuditRule
constraint.message: ContextSituation ID must not be null

constraints.constraint: entityContext.situations->forAll(s| (s<>self) implies (s.name<>self.name)) ContextSituationNameUniqueAuditRule ContextSituation name must be unique on this entity

constraint.name: ContextActionExpressionNotNullAuditRule
constraint.message: ContextAction expression must not be null

constraints.constraint:
situation.entityContext.system.entities->forAll(e | (e.id<>self.id) and e.situations->forAll(s | (s.id<>self.id)) and e.situations->forAll(s | s.sensingConditions->forAll(sc| (sc.id<>self.id)) and s.memoryConditions->forAll(mc| (mc.id<>self.id)) and s.actions->forAll(a | (a<>self) implies (a.id<>self.id)) ) and e.variables->forAll(v | (v.id<>self.id)) and e.state->forAll(st | st.id<>self.id) )
ContextActionIdUniqueAuditRule ContextAction ID must be unique

constraint.name: ContextActionIdNotNullAuditRule
constraint.message: ContextAction ID must not be null

constraint.name: ContextActionMemoryNameNotNullAuditRule
constraint.message: ContextAction memory name must not be null

constraints.constraint: situation.entityContext.state->collect(name)->includes(self.memoryName) ContextActionMemoryNameValidAuditRule ContextAction memory name not valid

constraint.name: ContextMemoryNameNotNullAuditRule
constraint.message: ContextMemory name must not be null

constraints.constraint: entityContext.state->forAll(s | (s<>self) implies (s.name<>self.name)) ContextMemoryNameUniqueAuditRule ContextMemory name must be unique on this entity

constraint.name: ContextMemoryIdNotNullAuditRule
constraint.message: ContextMemory ID must not be null

constraints.constraint:
entityContext.system.entities->forAll(e | (e.id<>self.id) and e.situations->forAll(s | (s.id<>self.id)) and e.situations->forAll(s | s.sensingConditions->forAll(sc| (sc.id<>self.id)) and s.memoryConditions->forAll(mc| (mc.id<>self.id)) and s.actions->forAll(a | (a.id<>self.id)) ) and e.variables->forAll(v | (v.id<>self.id)) and e.state->forAll(st | (st<>self) implies (st.id<>self.id)) )
ContextMemoryIdUniqueAuditRule ContextMemory ID must be unique
